title: The Mutant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a form at night and use your form.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can choose between 4 forms every night.
- Predator Form: 2 Unstoppable Attacks, you will not be able to act the following night.
- Precision Form: Unstoppable Attack.
- Frenzy Form: Powerful Rampage.
- Shield Form: Basic Attack, Invincible Defense.

desc:
Post 433
Adapting to different opponents and scenarios is how the Mutant got this far, and it's how the Mutant will conquer yet another town.
